Comments_List: Got to watch some interesting talks

It would be beneficial to new students planning their schedules if they new what this course was and where to look for when lecture series would be as not finding out about it until a few weeks in meant TA assignment dates were already decided which led to missing this course.

They bring in good speakers when they do... but more speakers need to be brought in. Maybe students could read a paper from the speaker beforehand or it could be a short class for first-years to discuss the research with Prof. Johnson.
